component.name: KDE Wallpaper Changer
component.summary: Automatically change KDE Plasma wallpapers based on time-of-day

description.p: KDE Wallpaper Changer is a beautiful, native KDE Plasma 6 application for automatically changing wallpapers based on time-of-day categories using .ddw (KDE wallpaper theme) zip files.

ul.li: Native KDE Plasma 6 integration with Breeze styling
Time-based wallpaper selection using Astral library
